food.name: Burger
food.desc: A quarter pound cheeseburger with bacon, lettuce, tomato, carmelized onion, and a house-made sauce

food.name: Fries
food.desc: Crispy shoestring fries tossed with a secret blend of seasoning

food.name: Vanilla milkshake
food.desc: A rich vanilla shake sourced from local dairy farms and topped with whipped cream

food.name: Hot dog
food.desc: A classic Chicago dog topped with tomatoes, mustard, sweet onion, and pickle on a hot poppyseed bun

food.name: Caesar salad
